title: Software Developer for Windows Applications (m/f) - MED-EL Medical Electronics
subtitle: Innsbruck, T 6020
body:
MED-EL is a leading manufacturer of innovative medical devices for the treatment of various types and degrees of hearing loss. Our unique portfolio of implantable hearing solutions benefits thousands of individuals in more than 100 countries worldwide. With headquarters in Innsbruck, Austria, MED-EL has over 2200 employees around the world. In support of our continuing growth, we currently have an open position with focus on:
Apply online

Software Developer for Windows Applications (m/f)

RD_SO11803
Innsbruck, Austria


Main Tasks

  • Development of Windows desktop applications for fitting and diagnosis of our implant systems
  • Programming of graphic user interfaces
  • Design, implementation, documentation and testing of software modules according to international requirements for medical devices
  • Cooperation with other expert groups

 

Requirements

  • Excellent programming skills in an object-oriented high-level language
  • Knowledge of C# and .NET is a plus
  • Preferably university degree in a technical field or equivalent technical education
  • Advanced English skills required
  • Self-reliant and accurate approach, communicative personality, team player
     

 
 
Salary will be determined based on professional experience; the formal minimum salary according to Collective Bargaining Agreement is EUR 37,022.44



We offer a challenging opportunity in a multinational work environment with English as our company language. We look forward to receiving your application at jobs.medel.com



Apply online

MED-EL Medical Electronics
